short_summary: to obtain accommodations in the vicinity of Prestwick
description: to support the Canadian Armed Forces
full_summary:
## Prestwick, UK Accommodations Tender Announcement

### Reference

* Solicitation Number: W8484-230449
* Reference Number: CB-5822-91253575
* Amendment Number: 6

### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND), Canada, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for accommodations in Prestwick, United Kingdom, to support the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: May 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 8, 2023 @ 11:00 AM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: September 30, 2023

### Solicitation Information

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of National Defence
* Contact Name: Adele van der Starren
* Contact Email: [adele.vanderstarren@forces.gc.ca](mailto:adele.vanderstarren@forces.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: (613) 219-0786

### Attachments

The following attachments are included in this RFP:

* [W8484-230449-RFP.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5822/w8484-230449-rfp.pdf)
* [W8484-230449-Questions-2-June.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5822/w8484-230449-questions-2-june.pdf)
